resources.string: GPS and Network Location Services are both unavailable!
Please enable wifi for accurate locations!
The Geotrigger SDK can\'t run without Google Play Services.

This sample application creates a 100m radius trigger around the current device location. The trigger will fire when you travel 100m from your current location.\n\nIf you do not receive a push notification, please ensure that push notifications have been set up correctly on the ArcGIS for Developers site and in the Google Cloud Console.
